Welp this isn't 100% but i got it to work a couple of times for games.

It is called [glow=red,2,300]3DRipperDX[/glow]

http://www.deep-shadows.com/hax/3DRipperDX.htm

and a quick start guide http://www.deep-shadows.com/hax/3DRipperDX.htm#quickstartguide

in a nut shell you launch the game in window mode from 3dripperdx

and take a 'screenshot' of the models and textures that you can export easily to 3dsmax

make sure you point to the game itself and not a launcher

The program works but is very crude and may not get the best results

*i got it to work with World of Tanks

*i am not sure of the legality of this but either way DO NOT CLAIM others people work

that is never cool
The only illegality in this is selling it on the forums or as part of the game package. However, this does attract... undue attention.

I figured before someone whipped out an epic 3d model of ridiculous standards that this should be said and looked for

i just did some cutting edge research by that i mean searched google while eating popcorn

and i found this

This is for the UK and so im not 100% sure about global laws.

i would only use it if you where going to change a very large portion of the model *and still give credit

AND NEVER SELL IT
It depends on who's hosting the server unfortunately, not who's making the models.

o crud, i take it no one from the forums is a international copyright lawyer that can vouch with 100% certainty.

o come i cant even find info for my own country (usa) how is the 'average man' so post to know this stuff?

come on government i am trying to be legal here
The government doesn't care, it's companies like Maxis and Bungie that'll sting ya for using their models.

I agree but the public isn't going to find a game to take a 3d model from the government its going to be from a company

and i dont want anyone to get in trouble over this
Probably won't. As long as they're released as mods, should be fine (ie Garry's Mod). But I'd like to see more original work using models built for the game than a flood of video game adapter items.
Agreed i like the low poly style they having going on now. Clean and crisp
